# cook your dish here
for T in range(int(input())):
 s,n = list(map(int,input().split()))
 coins = 0
 
 if (s%2!=0):
  s -=1 
  coins += 1 
 
 coins += (s//n)
 if(s%n!=0):
  coins += 1 
 
 print(coins)

for _ in range(int(input())):
 S,N=(int(i) for i in input().strip().split())
 coinCount=0
 if(S%2==1):
  S-=1
  coinCount+=1
 coinCount+=S//N
 if(S%N!=0):
  coinCount+=1

# cook your dish here
t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
 s, n = map(int, input().split())
 cnt = 0
 curr = n
 while s > 0 and curr != 0:
  cnt += s // curr
  s = s % curr
  curr = (s // 2) * 2
 if s > 0:
  cnt += 1
 print(cnt)

 if(m%2==0 or m==1):

for _ in range(int(input())):
 S, N = map(int, input().split())
 c = S // N 
 S %= N 
 if S > 0:
  c += (2 if (S%2 and S>1) else 1)
 print(c)
